4j.advancement.config.root.name: Client Options
4j.advancement.config.armorbar.desc:
Don't show armor you are wearing

§6Can be toggled with /trigger armorbar
4j.advancement.config.armorbar.name: Disable ArmorBar
4j.advancement.config.custompack.desc:
Allow the usage of a Custom Resource Pack.

§6Can be toggled with /trigger maptextures set -2
4j.advancement.config.custompack.name: Custom Resources
4j.advancement.config.globalpack.desc:
Disable the per-map texture packs.

§6Can be toggled with /trigger maptextures
4j.advancement.config.globalpack.name: No per-map textures
4j.advancement.config.nohotbarswap.desc:
Disable hotbar item swapping. (When using a throwable or dropping an item, that slot will be refilled)

§6Can be toggled with /trigger hotbarswap
4j.advancement.config.nohotbarswap.name: Disabled Hotbar Item Swapping
4j.advancement.config.optifine.desc:
Use the optifine-compatible resource pack.

§6Can be toggled with /trigger optifinepack
4j.advancement.config.optifine.name: OptiFine Resources
4j.advancement.config.swaptipped.desc:
Ignore tipped arrows when using hotbarswapping.

§6Can be toggled with /trigger swaptipped
4j.advancement.config.swaptipped.name: No tipped arrows hotbar swap
4j.advancement.config.vtdarkmode.desc:
Use the dark mode inventory texture from VanillaTweaks for small inventory.

§6Can be toggled with /trigger vtdarkinv
4j.advancement.config.vtdarkmode.name: VT Dark Small Inventory
4j.advancement.config.clearsmall.desc:
Don't use a texture for small inventory.

§6Can be toggled with /trigger clearsmallinv
4j.advancement.config.clearsmall.name: Invisible Small Inventory
4j.advancement.config.spawnenchanted.des:
Allow auto equip to swap armor even if its enchanted

§6Can be toggled with /trigger swapenchanted
4j.advancement.root.name: Battle Achievements
4j.advancement.cupid.desc: Kill 2 players in a round of a battle mini game using a bow and arrow.
4j.advancement.cupid.name: Cupid
4j.advancement.hunger.desc: Kill a player while you are starving in a Battle mini game.
4j.advancement.hunger.name: Hunger Pain
4j.advancement.master.desc: Win 3 battle games in a row.
4j.advancement.master.name: ...has become the master
4j.advancement.mine.desc: Open every chest in a Battle mini game arena in one round.
4j.advancement.mine.name: Mine!
4j.advancement.scratch.desc: Take 100 damage in a round of a battle mini game.
4j.advancement.scratch.name: 'Tis but a scratch
4j.advancement.student.name: The student...
4j.config.custompack.enable:
§aCustom Pack enabled!
§6Please relog for changes to apply.

4j.resource.reloadresource.customenabled: You can not reload resources when you have a custom pack enabled!
4j.game.specjoin: %s has joined the game as an alive player!
4j.lobby.start.waiting: 1 or more additional players are required to start the round...
4j.mapdecider.vote.alreadyvoted: You have already voted for this map!
4j.mapdecider.menu.header: Click on the option you would like to use
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.crucib: A world build deep in the Nether, with plenty of lava for your enemies to swim in!
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.cove: Try to survive in this pirate's hidden camp, full of shipwrecks and caves!
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.cavern: This ancient looking underground structure is the perfect place to sneak up on your enemies!
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.temple: This mysterious temple is set within the deepest jungle. Watch out for enemies lurking in the tree tops
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.atlant: Deep beneath the ocean, a lost city lay in ruins. Atlantis awaits the battle.
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.ruin: Abandoned and left to ruin, there are still secrets left to be found. Battle for the remaining resources and survive this hazardous place.
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.siege: Brave the enemy walls or defend the keep. The siege is upon us.
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.castle: Crown yourself in glory in the Castle's great halls.
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.invasi: An alien attack has created a dangerous arena. Defend your rooftops but don't fall off!
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.shipya: A port in the sky away from the storm, but this area is anything but calm.
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.fronti: It's high noon! Things are about to get wild in the Old West, so grab a fistful of TNT, slap on a sou'wester and prepare for an almighty dustbowl dust-up between the good, the bad, and the ugly.
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.dig: A snowbound excavation site lies deserted. What unspeakable things did the scientists discover beneath the ice? Find out for yourself, while battling against both the elements and each other!
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.shrunk: Are you tiny or is everything else just really, really big? Be careful not to lose your sense of proportion as you fight your way across this over-sized bedroom and tidy up the competition.
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.valley: Discover your inner self as you battle across this ancient land of dragons! This battle map is exclusive to the Chinese Mythology Mash Up.
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.hallow: Something wicked this way comes. Full of deadly thrills and sinister shocks, it will scare you off your Minecraft blocks!
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.festiv: Get together with friends and family for some Minecraft-style tussling in this special seasonal map. The more the merrier! Guaranteed to be more fun than pretending you like the socks your uncle gave you.
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.atomic: Face the perils of the General Atomics Galleria! Is Mister Handy friend or foe? Will you dodge the traps rigged to blow?
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.libert: Battle through the troubled waters of Libertalia! Who will captain the seas in this watery graveyard of ships?
4j.mapdecider.menu.voting.mapdesc.capito: Clamber through the ruins of the Capitol! Who will rise from the rubble to battle their way through the wasteland?
4j.menu.host.title: Please press §6[%s§6]
4j.menu.host.subtitle: And use the menu to configure your game.
4j.menu.host.start: You have not started your game for 2 minutes! It will now automatically start to prevent abuse.
4j.menu.host.config.cantchangemaps: You cannot change enabled maps when the game is already started!
4j.menu.host.config.item.needone: You need at least 1 item set enabled!

4j.menu.host.config.update.item.random.e: added %s Item Set to %s Item Set
4j.menu.host.config.needhost: You need host permissions to do that!
4j.menu.host.transfer.name: Transfer Host
4j.menu.host.transfer.header: Click on the player you wish to transfer host permissions to!
4j.menu.player.waiting: Waiting on host to configure game...
4j.relog.join.discord: Come join the Community Server to talk about LEB, ask for help, find groups to play with and see development updates!
4j.relog.join.patreon: Please consider supporting the server on %s
